0: AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE NATIONAL ORGANIC AGRICULTURE PROGRAM BY ENHANCING REGULATORY CAPACITY, ESTABLISHING COORDINATING OFFICES, AUGMENTING HUMAN RESOURCE COMPLEMENT AND REPEALING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10068, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03599
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE NATIONAL ORGANIC AGRICULTURE PROGRAM BY ENHANCING REGULATORY CAPACITY, ESTABLISHING COORDINATING OFFICES, AUGMENTING HUMAN RESOURCE COMPLEMENT AND REPEALING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10068, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GARIN, SHARON S.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-07
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (000 2019-10-07)2. Savellano (000 2019-11-12)
3. Cojuangco (000 2019-11-18)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-11-05
          -The Committee created a technical working group (TWG), to be chaired by Rep. Sharon S. Garin, to further study the bill.
      2. Deliberated by the TWG on 2019-12-11
          -The Chair, Rep. Sharon S. Garin, directed all resource persons to submit their agency's official position to the Committee for the drafting of the substitute bill to be presented to the Mother Committee.
MOTHER BILL: HB06878
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-08-14
